abstract: The six banks led by Citigroup that are being sued by Clear Channel Communications and its buyers argued in a court filing Wednesday that a lawsuit against them should be dismissed and a temporary restraining order lifted. (Read the filings as a PDF here.)
lead_paragraph: The six banks led by Citigroup that are being sued by Clear Channel Communications and its buyers argued in a court filing Wednesday that a lawsuit against them should be dismissed and a temporary restraining order lifted. (Read the filings as a PDF here.)

headline.main: Banks Seek to Dismiss Clear Channel’s Texas Suit
